# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  rlc.cir rlc.cir.prn.gs.pl rlc.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.prn.gs.pl PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}RLC/rlc.cir.sh COMMAND bash rlc.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rlc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/RLC/rlc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}RLC/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;resistor;capacitor;inductor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}RLC/rlc.cir.sh COMMAND bash rlc.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rlc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/RLC/rlc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}RLC/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;resistor;capacitor;inductor")
endif()
